name: HyphenationExceptions

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the HyphenationException.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the HyphenationException with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByName
methods.description: Returns the HyphenationException with the specified name.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the HyphenationExceptions within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The HyphenationException, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: HyphenationException, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The HyphenationException, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: HyphenationException, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first HyphenationException in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last HyphenationException in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle HyphenationException in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the HyphenationException with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the HyphenationException that follows the desired HyphenationException.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the HyphenationException whose index follows the specified HyphenationException in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The HyphenationException whose index comes before the desired HyphenationException.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any HyphenationException in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every HyphenationException in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the HyphenationException.
Returns the HyphenationException with the specified index.

description: A collection of hyphenation exceptions lists.
